snippet: Following an address to the United Nations from Israel’s prime minister that was an extended attack on the credibility of Iran’s new president, an Iranian diplomat exercised his country’s right to reply.
abstract: Following an address to the United Nations from Israel’s prime minister that was an extended attack on the credibility of Iran’s new president, an Iranian diplomat exercised his country’s right to reply.

headline.main: Video of Israel and Iran Sparring at U.N.
